order_id.description: Unique identifier of the pegged order generated by the core to fulfil this liquidity order

liquidity_order.description: The liquidity order from the original submission

LiquidityOrderReference.title: Liquidity Order Reference
LiquidityOrderReference.description: A pair of a liquidity order and the id of the generated order by the core

reference.title: Pegged Reference
reference.description: A pegged reference defines which price point a pegged order is linked to - meaning the price for a pegged order is calculated from the value of the reference price point

proportion.description: The relative proportion of the commitment to be allocated at a price level

offset.description: The offset/amount of units away for the order
